addr: Pulitzer Hall. 2950 Broadway (at 116th Street). New York, NY 10027
title: Invitation to DocFest’15 - Saturday, December 5
desc:
JOIN US FOR A DAY OF DOCUMENTARIES? 
 The Columbia Journalism School Documentary Program invites you to celebrate and scout the work of tomorrow?s filmmakers. ? 
 Starting at 10 a.m., we?ll be screening eight short documentaries from the graduating class, followed by Q&A, special guest appearances, and a cocktail reception at the end of the day. 
 For more information on the films and filmmakers, please visit our  website ?and watch the? DocFest '15 Trailer? 
 We think you?ll be enthralled by this year?s crop of outstanding documentaries and hope you can join us.? 
 June Cross and Betsy West
